channel.title: Unrequested tailor-made opinions
channel.description: Recent content on Unrequested tailor-made opinions

item.title: This is me!
item.description: “I can scarcely bid you good bye, even in a letter. I always made an awkward bow.”- John Keats (November 30, 1820) Catch-phrase description of my own self: seasoned inconspicuous writer who – as the Elton John line goes – wide-eyed roams the night in search of beauty and love. Actual description of my (boring) own self: natural bookworm with a very keen eye for details. I was born and raised in a provincial town in Northern Italy, which is to say, that part of the country that is neither Florence, nor Venice, nor Rome.
